item.title: Why My Web Font Looks Ugly on IE?
item.description: Windows needs hand-tuned hinting which is missing in many web fonts. To solve this problem, there is a tool called ttfautohint which can automatically add hinting to font files. There is a tutorial, and an online tool called Fontie.
